# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-110">중요 한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-115">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-117">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-120">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-123">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-149">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-151">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-154">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-155">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-156">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-157">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-158">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-159">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-163">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-164">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-170">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-170">DNI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-171">개인의 NIC 국내 레지스트리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-171">NIC National Registry of Persons</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-176">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-178">뱅크 상태 분기 번호 유무에 관계 없이 6 ~ twn 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-178">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-180">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-182">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-184">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-195">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-195">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-197">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-197">swift bank code</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-210">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-210">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-211">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-212">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-212">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-214">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-214">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-215">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-216">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-216">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-217">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-218">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-218">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-219">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-220">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-220">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-221">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-221">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-222">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-223">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-224">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-226">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-227">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-227">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-228">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-229">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-229">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-232">오스트레일리아 business 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-232">australia business no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-233">근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-233">business number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-239">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-239">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-240">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-241">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-241">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-242">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-243">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-243">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-244">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-244">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-245">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-245">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-246">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-246">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-247">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-247">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-248">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-248">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-249">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-250">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-250">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-251">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-252">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-253">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-254">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-254">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-255">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-255">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-256">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-256">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-266">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-266">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-267">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-268">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-268">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-270">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-270">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-271">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-271">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-272">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-272">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-273">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-273">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-274">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-275">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-275">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-276">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-276">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-277">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-277">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-278">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-278">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-279">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-280">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-282">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-282">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-283">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-283">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-284">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-284">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-285">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-285">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-299">Drivers Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-299">Drivers Lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-300">Drivers Lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-300">Drivers Lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-301">Drivers Licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-301">Drivers Licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-302">Drivers Licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-302">Drivers Licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-303">Driver' Lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-303">Driver'Lic</span></span>

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-385">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-385">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-386">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-387">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-387">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-388">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-389">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-389">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-390">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-390">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-391">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-391">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-392">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-392">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-393">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-393">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-394">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-395">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-395">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-397">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-397">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-398">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-398">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-399">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-399">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-400">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-400">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-412">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-412">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-413">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-414">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-414">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-416">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-416">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-418">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-418">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-421">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-421">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-422">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-422">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-424">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-424">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-425">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-425">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-426">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-426">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-427">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-427">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-428">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-428">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-429">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-429">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-430">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-430">Passportno</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-456">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-456">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-457">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-458">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-458">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-459">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-460">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-460">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-461">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-461">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-462">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-462">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-463">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-463">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-464">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-464">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-465">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-465">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-466">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-466">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-467">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-467">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-468">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-468">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-469">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-469">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-470">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-470">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-471">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-471">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-472">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-472">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-484">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-484">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-485">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-487">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-487">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-489">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-489">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-490">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-491">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-491">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-492">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-493">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-493">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-494">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-494">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-495">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-495">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-512">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-512">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-513">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-514">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-514">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-516">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-516">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="36517-517">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-517">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-518">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-518">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-519">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-520">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-520">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-521">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-523">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-523">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-524">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-524">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-525">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-525">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-526">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-526">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-527">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-527">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-528">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-528">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-529">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-529">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-530">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-530">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-531">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-531">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-532">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-533">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-533">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-534">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-535">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-535">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-536">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-536">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-537">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-537">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-538">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-538">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-539">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-540">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-540">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-543">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-543">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-544">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-544">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-545">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-545">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-546">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-546">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-547">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-547">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-548">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-548">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-549">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-549">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-550">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-550">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-551">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-551">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-552">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-552">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-553">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-553">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-554">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-555">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-555">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-557">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-557">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-558">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-558">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-559">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-559">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-560">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-560">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-561">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-562">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-562">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-564">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-564">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-565">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-565">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-566">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-566">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-567">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-567">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-569">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-569">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-585">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-585">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-586">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-587">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-587">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-588">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-589">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-589">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-590">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-590">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-591">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-591">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-592">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-593">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-593">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-594">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-594">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-596">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-596">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-598">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-599">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-599">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-600">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-600">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-601">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-602">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-602">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-625">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-625">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-627">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-627">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-629">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-629">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-630">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-630">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-631">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-631">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-632">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-632">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-633">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-633">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-634">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-634">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-635">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-635">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-636">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-636">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-637">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-637">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-638">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-638">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-639">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-639">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-640">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-641">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-641">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-642">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-643">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-644">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-644">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-645">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-645">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-647">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-647">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-665">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-665">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-666">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-667">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-667">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-668">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-668">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-669">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-669">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-670">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-670">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-671">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-671">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-672">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-672">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-673">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-673">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-674">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-675">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-678">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-678">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-679">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-679">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-694">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-694">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-696">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-696">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-697">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-697">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-698">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-698">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-699">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-699">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-700">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-700">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-701">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-701">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-702">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-702">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-703">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-703">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-704">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-704">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-705">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-705">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-706">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-706">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-707">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-707">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-708">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-708">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-709">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-709">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-710">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-710">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-711">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-711">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-712">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-712">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-713">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-713">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-714">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-714">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-715">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-715">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-716">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-716">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-717">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-717">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-718">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-718">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-719">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-719">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-720">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-720">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-721">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-721">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-722">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-722">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-737">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-737">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-738">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-739">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-739">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-740">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-740">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-741">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-741">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-742">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-742">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-743">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-743">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-744">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-744">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-745">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-745">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-746">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-746">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-747">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-747">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-748">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-748">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-749">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-749">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-750">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-750">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-751">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-751">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-752">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-752">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-753">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-753">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-754">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-754">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-755">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-755">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-756">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-757">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-757">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-760">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-760">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-761">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-761">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-763">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-763">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-764">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-764">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-765">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-765">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-766">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-766">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-767">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-767">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-768">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-768">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-769">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-769">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-770">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-770">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-771">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-771">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-772">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-772">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-773">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-773">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-774">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-774">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-775">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-775">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-776">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-776">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-777">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-777">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-778">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-778">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-779">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-779">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-780">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-780">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-781">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-781">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-782">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-782">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-783">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-784">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-784">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-787">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-787">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-788">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-788">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
