## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-803">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-803">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-804">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-805">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-805">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-806">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-806">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-807">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-807">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-808">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-808">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-809">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-809">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-810">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-810">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-811">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-811">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-812">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-812">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-813">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-813">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-814">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-814">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-815">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-815">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-816">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-816">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-817">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-818">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-820">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-821">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-821">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-822">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-822">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-837">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-837">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-838">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-839">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-839">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-840">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-840">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-841">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-841">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-842">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-842">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-843">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-843">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-844">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-844">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-845">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-845">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-846">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-846">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-847">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-847">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-848">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-849">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-849">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-850">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-851">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-851">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-852">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-852">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-853">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-853">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-854">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-855">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-855">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-856">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-856">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-857">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-858">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-858">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-859">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-860">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-861">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-862">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-863">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-863">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-864">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-864">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-865">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-865">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-866">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-866">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-867">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-868">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-868">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-869">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-869">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-870">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-870">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-871">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-871">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-873">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-873">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-876">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-876">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-877">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-877">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-885">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-885">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-892">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-892">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-893">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-893">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-894">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-894">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-895">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-895">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-896">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-896">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-897">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-897">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-898">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-898">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-899">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-900">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-900">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-901">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-901">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-902">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-902">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-903">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-903">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-904">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-905">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-905">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-906">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-906">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-907">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-908">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-908">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-909">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-910">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-910">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-911">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-911">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-912">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-912">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-913">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-913">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-914">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-914">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-919">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-919">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-922">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-922">northwind</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-931">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-931">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-932">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-933">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-933">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-934">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-935">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-935">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-936">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-936">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-937">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-937">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-938">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-939">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-941">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-942">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-942">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-943">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-943">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-944">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-944">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-945">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-946">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-946">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-947">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-948">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-948">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-949">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-949">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-950">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-950">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-951">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-951">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-952">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-952">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-953">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-953">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-954">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-954">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-976">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-976">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-978">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-978">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-980">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-980">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-981">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-981">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-982">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-982">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-983">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-983">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-984">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-984">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-985">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-985">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-987">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-990">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-990">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-991">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-991">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-993">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-994">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-994">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-995">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1054">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1054">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-1055">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1055">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1056">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1057">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1057">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1058">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1058">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1059">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1059">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1060">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1061">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1061">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1063">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1064">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1064">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1065">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1065">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1066">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1066">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1068">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1068">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1069">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1069">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1070">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1070">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1071">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1071">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1072">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1072">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1075">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1075">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-1076">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1076">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1078">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1078">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1080">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1080">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1081">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1082">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1084">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1086">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1086">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-1087">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1087">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1088">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1088">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1108">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1108">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1109">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1110">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1110">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1112">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1112">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1113">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1113">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1114">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1114">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1115">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1115">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1116">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1116">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1117">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1117">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1118">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1118">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1119">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1119">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1120">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1120">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1122">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1122">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1124">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1125">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1125">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1126">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1126">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1128">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1128">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1130">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1130">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1136">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1136">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1137">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1137">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1138">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1138">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1139">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1139">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1140">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1140">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1142">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1142">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1144">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1144">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1145">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1145">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1146">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1146">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1147">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1147">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1148">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1148">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1149">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1150">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1150">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1151">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1151">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1152">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1152">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1153">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1153">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1154">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1155">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1155">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1156">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1157">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1157">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1158">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1158">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1159">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1159">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1160">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1161">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1161">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1162">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1162">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1163">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1163">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1165">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1165">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1166">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1166">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1167">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1167">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1168">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1168">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1169">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1169">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1170">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1170">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1171">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1171">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1172">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1172">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1173">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1173">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1174">고 eita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1174">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1175">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1175">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1176">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1177">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1177">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1178">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1179">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1179">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1180">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1180">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1181">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1181">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1182">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1183">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1183">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1184">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1184">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1185">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1185">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1186">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1186">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1187">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1187">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1188">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1188">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1189">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1190">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1190">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1191">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1192">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1193">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1193">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1194">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1194">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1195">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1196">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1196">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1197">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1197">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1198">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1198">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1211">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1211">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1212">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1212">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1220">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1220">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1221">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1222">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1222">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1223">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1223">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1225">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1225">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1226">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1226">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1227">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1227">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1228">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1228">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1229">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1229">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1230">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1231">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1231">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1232">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1232">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1233">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1233">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1234">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1234">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1235">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1235">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1236">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1236">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1238">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1238">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1240">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1241">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1241">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1242">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1242">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1243">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1244">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1244">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1245">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1245">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1246">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1246">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1257">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1257">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-1258">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1258">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1259">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1260">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1260">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1261">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1262">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1262">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1263">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1264">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1264">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1265">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1267">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1267">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1268">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1268">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1287">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1287">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1289">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1289">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1291">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1291">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1292">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1292">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1293">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1293">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1294">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1294">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1295">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1295">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1297">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1297">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1300">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1300">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1301">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1301">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1303">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1303">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1346">униформгражданскиid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1346">униформгражданскиid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1347">униформгражданскине. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1347">униформгражданскине.#</span></span>


## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1348">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1348">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-1349">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1350">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1351">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1351">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1352">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1353">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1353">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1354">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1354">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1355">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1355">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1356">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1356">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1358">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1358">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1359">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1359">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1360">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1360">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1361">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1361">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1362">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1362">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1363">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1363">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1364">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1364">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1365">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1365">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1366">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1366">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1367">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1368">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1368">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1370">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1370">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1371">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1371">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1372">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1372">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1373">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1373">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1374">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1374">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1375">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1375">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1376">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1376">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1377">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1378">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1379">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1380">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1381">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1381">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1382">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1382">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1383">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1383">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1385">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1385">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1386">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1386">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1410">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1410">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1411">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1412">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1412">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1414">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1414">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1416">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1416">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1419">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1419">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1420">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1420">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1421">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1421">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1422">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1422">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1423">Keyword_ [province_name] _drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1423">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1424">시/도 약어(예: AB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1424">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1425">시/도 이름(예: 앨버타)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1425">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1426">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1426">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1427">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1427">DL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1428">된다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1428">DLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1429">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1429">CDL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1430">CDLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1430">CDLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1431">DriverLic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1431">DriverLic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1432">DriverLics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1432">DriverLics</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1557">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1557">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1559">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1559">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1561">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1561">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1562">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1563">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1564">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1565">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1566">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1566">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1567">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1567">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1568">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1568">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1569">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1569">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>
