## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1579">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1579">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1580">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1581">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1581">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1583">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1583">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1588">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1588">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1589">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1589">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1619">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1619">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1620">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1621">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1621">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1622">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1623">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1624">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1625">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1628">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1628">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1629">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1629">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1662">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1662">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1664">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1664">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1666">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1666">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1667">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1668">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1668">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1669">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1670">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1670">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1671">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1671">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1672">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1672">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1673">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1674">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1677">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1677">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1678">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1678">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1679">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1679">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1680">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1680">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1681">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1681">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1682">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1682">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1683">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1684">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1684">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1685">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1685">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1686">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1686">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1711">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1711">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1712">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1713">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1713">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1715">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1715">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1716">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1716">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1717">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1717">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1718">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1718">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1719">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1719">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1720">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1720">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1721">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1721">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1722">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1722">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1724">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1724">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1727">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1727">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1728">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1728">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1729">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1729">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1731">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1731">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1732">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1732">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1747">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1747">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1748">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1749">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1749">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1751">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1751">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1752">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1752">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1753">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1753">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1754">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1754">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1755">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1755">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1756">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1757">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1757">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1760">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1760">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1761">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1761">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1762">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1764">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1764">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1765">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1765">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1778">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1778">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1779">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1780">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1780">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1782">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1782">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1783">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1784">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1784">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-1785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1787">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1787">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1788">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1788">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1789">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1789">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1790">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1790">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-1791">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1791">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-1793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1793">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1794">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1794">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-1795">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-1795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2055">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2055">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2056">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2057">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2058">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2058">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2060">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2060">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2061">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2061">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2062">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2062">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2063">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2063">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2065">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2065">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2066">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2066">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2072">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2072">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2082">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2082">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2083">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2083">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2084">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2084">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2085">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2085">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2086">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2086">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2087">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2087">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2088">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2089">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2089">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2090">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2091">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2091">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2092">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2092">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2093">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2093">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2124">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2124">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2125">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2125">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2126">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2126">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2127">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2127">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2128">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2128">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2129">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2129">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2131">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2134">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2134">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2135">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2135">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2136">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2136">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2137">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2137">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2138">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2138">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2139">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2139">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2140">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2140">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2141">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2141">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2142">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2142">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2143">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2144">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2144">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2145">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2146">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2146">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2147">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2147">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2148">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2148">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2149">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2150">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2150">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2152">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2153">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2153">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2154">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2154">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2155">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2155">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2157">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2157">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2158">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2158">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2189">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2189">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2190">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2190">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2191">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2192">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2192">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2194">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2194">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2195">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2195">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2196">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2196">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2197">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2198">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2198">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2199">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2201">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2201">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2202">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2202">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2204">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2204">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2209">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2209">national identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2219">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2219">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2220">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2220">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

   
## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2221">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2221">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2222">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2222">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2223">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2224">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2224">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2226">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2226">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2227">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2227">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2228">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2228">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2229">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2229">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2230">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2230">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2231">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2231">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2232">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2232">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2247">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2247">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2248">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2249">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2249">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2251">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2251">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2252">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2252">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2253">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2253">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2254">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2254">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2255">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2255">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2256">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2257">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2266">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2267">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2269">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2269">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2271">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2271">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2273">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2276">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2277">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2278">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2278">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2279">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2279">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2281">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2284">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2286">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2286">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2288">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2288">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2289">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2289">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2290">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2290">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2291">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2291">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2292">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2293">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2293">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2294">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2295">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2295">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2296">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2296">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2297">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2297">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2298">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2298">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2299">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2299">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2327">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2327">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2328">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2330">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2330">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2332">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2332">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2333">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2333">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2334">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2334">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2335">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2335">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2336">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2337">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2340">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2340">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2341">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2341">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2342">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2342">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2343">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2343">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2344">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2344">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2345">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2345">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2346">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2346">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2347">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2347">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2348">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2348">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2349">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2349">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2358">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2358">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2359">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2359">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2360">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2361">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2361">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2362">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2363">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2363">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2364">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2364">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2365">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2365">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2366">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2366">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2367">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2367">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2368">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2368">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2369">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2369">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2370">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2370">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2371">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2371">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2372">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2372">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2373">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2373">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2374">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2374">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2375">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2375">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2376">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2376">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2377">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2377">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2378">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2379">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2379">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2381">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2381">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2382">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2382">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2383">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2383">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2384">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2384">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2385">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2385">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2386">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2386">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2387">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2387">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2388">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2388">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2389">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2390">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2390">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2391">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2392">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2392">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2393">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2393">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2394">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2394">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2395">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2396">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2396">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2397">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2397">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2398">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2398">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2445">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2445">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2446">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2446">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2448">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2448">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2450">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2450">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2451">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2451">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2452">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2452">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2453">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2453">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2454">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2454">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2455">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2456">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2456">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2457">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2458">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2458">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2459">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2459">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2460">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2460">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2461">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2461">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2462">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2462">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2478">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2478">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2479">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2479">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2480">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2480">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2481">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2481">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2482">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2482">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2483">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2483">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2484">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2487">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2487">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2488">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2488">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2489">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2489">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2506">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2506">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2507">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2507">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2508">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2509">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2509">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2511">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2511">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2512">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2513">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2513">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2515">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2516">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2516">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2517">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2517">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2518">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2518">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2519">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2519">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2520">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2520">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2521">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2521">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2522">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2522">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2523">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2523">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2524">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2524">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2525">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2525">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2526">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2526">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2527">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2528">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2528">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2530">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2530">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2531">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2531">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2532">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2532">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2533">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2533">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2534">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2535">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2536">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2537">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2537">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2538">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2538">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2539">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2539">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2541">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2542">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2542">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2543">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2544">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_denmark_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2545">Keyword_denmark_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2545">Keyword_denmark_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2546">centrale personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2546">centrale personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2547">civilt registreringssystem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2547">civilt registreringssystem</span></span>
