## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2615">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2615">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2616">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2616">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2617">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2618">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2618">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2619">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2620">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2620">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2621">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2621">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2622">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2622">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2623">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2623">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2624">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2625">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2625">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2628">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2628">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2629">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2629">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2630">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2631">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2631">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2632">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2633">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2633">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2634">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2634">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2643">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2643">cpr-nummer</span></span>

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2645">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2645">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2646">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2647">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2647">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2649">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2649">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2650">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2650">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2651">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2651">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2652">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2652">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2653">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2654">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2654">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2655">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2656">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2656">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2657">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2657">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2658">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2658">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2659">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2659">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2660">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2660">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2661">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2661">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2662">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2662">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2664">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2664">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2666">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2666">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2667">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2667">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2668">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2668">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2669">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2670">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2670">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2672">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2673">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2673">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2674">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2674">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2680">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2680">driver license number</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2690">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2690">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2691">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2692">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2692">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2693">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2694">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2694">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2695">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2695">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2696">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2696">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2697">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2697">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2698">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2698">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2699">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2700">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2700">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2701">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2702">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2703">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2703">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2704">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2705">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2705">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2706">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2706">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2739">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2739">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-2740">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2742">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2742">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2744">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2744">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2745">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2746">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2746">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2748">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2748">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2749">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2749">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2750">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2750">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2751">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2751">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2752">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2752">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2757">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2757">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2758">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2759">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2759">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2760">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2761">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2761">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2762">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2763">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-2764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-2765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2766">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2766">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2767">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2767">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-2768">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2768">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-2769">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2769">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-2770">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2770">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-2771">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2771">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-2772">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2772">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-2773">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-2773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3219">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3219">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3220">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3220">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3221">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3222">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3222">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3223">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3224">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3224">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3225">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3225">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3226">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3226">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3227">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3227">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3229">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3232">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3232">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3233">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3233">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3234">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3234">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3235">Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3235">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3236">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3236">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3237">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3237">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3238">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3238">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3239">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3239">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3240">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3240">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3241">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3241">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3242">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3242">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3243">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3243">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3244">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3244">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3245">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3245">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3246">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3246">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3247">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3247">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3248">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3248">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3249">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3249">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3250">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3251">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3251">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3253">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3253">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3254">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3254">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3255">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3255">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3256">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3256">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3257">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3258">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3258">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3259">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3260">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3260">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3261">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3261">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3262">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3262">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3280">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3280">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3281">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3282">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3282">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3283">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3284">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3284">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3285">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3285">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3286">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3286">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3287">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3287">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3288">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3288">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3289">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3290">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3290">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3292">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3293">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3293">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3294">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3294">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3295">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3295">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3296">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3297">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3297">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3298">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3298">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3347">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3347">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3348">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3348">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3349">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3349">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3350">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3350">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3351">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3352">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3352">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3353">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3353">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3354">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3354">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3355">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3356">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3356">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3357">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3358">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3358">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3359">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3359">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3360">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3360">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3361">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3361">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3362">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3362">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3363">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3363">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3364">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3364">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3365">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3365">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3366">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3366">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3367">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3368">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3368">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3370">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3370">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3371">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3371">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3372">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3372">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3373">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3373">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3374">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3374">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3375">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3375">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3376">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3376">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3377">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3377">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3378">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3379">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3379">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3380">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3382">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3382">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3383">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3383">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3385">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3385">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3409">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3409">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3410">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3410">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3411">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3412">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3412">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3414">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3414">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3416">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3416">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3419">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3419">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3420">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3420">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3421">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3421">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3422">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3422">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3434">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3434">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3435">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3436">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3436">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3438">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3438">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3439">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3439">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3440">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3440">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3441">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3441">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3442">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3442">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3443">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3443">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3444">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3444">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3445">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3445">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3446">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3446">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3447">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3447">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3448">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3448">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3449">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3449">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3450">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3450">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3451">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3451">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3452">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3452">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3453">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3453">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3454">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3454">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3455">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3455">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3456">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3457">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3457">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3458">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3459">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3459">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3460">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3461">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3463">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3464">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3464">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3465">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3465">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3466">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3466">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3467">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3467">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3468">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3468">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3469">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3469">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3470">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3470">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3471">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3471">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3472">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3472">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3473">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3473">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3474">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3474">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3475">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3475">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3476">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3476">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3477">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3477">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3478">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3478">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3479">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3479">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3480">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3480">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3481">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3482">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3482">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3483">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3484">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3484">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3485">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3485">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3486">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3486">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3487">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3487">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3488">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3489">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3491">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3492">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3492">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3493">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3493">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3494">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3494">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3495">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3495">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3498">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3498">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3499">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3499">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3500">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3500">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3501">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3501">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3502">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3502">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3503">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3503">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3504">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3504">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3505">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3505">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3506">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3506">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3507">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3507">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3508">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3508">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3509">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3509">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3510">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3510">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3511">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3511">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3512">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3512">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3513">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3513">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3514">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3514">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3515">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3515">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3516">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3517">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3517">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3519">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3519">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3520">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3520">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3521">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3521">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3522">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3522">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3523">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3524">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3526">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3526">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3527">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3527">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3528">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3528">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3529">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3530">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3531">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3531">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3532">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3532">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3533">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3533">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3535">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3535">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3545">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3545">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3546">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3546">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3547">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3547">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-3548">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3548">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3549">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3549">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3559">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3559">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3560">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3561">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3561">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3563">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3563">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3564">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3564">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3565">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3565">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3566">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3566">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3567">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3567">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3568">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3568">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3569">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3569">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3570">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3570">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3571">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3571">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3572">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3572">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3573">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3573">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3574">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3575">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3575">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3576">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3577">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3577">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3578">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3578">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3579">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3579">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3580">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3580">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3581">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3581">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3601">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3601">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3603">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3603">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3605">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3605">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3606">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3606">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3607">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3607">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3608">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3608">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3609">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3609">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3610">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3610">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3611">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3611">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3612">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3612">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3613">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3613">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3614">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3614">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3615">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3616">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3616">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3619">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3619">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3620">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3620">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3622">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3622">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3624">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3624">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3625">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3625">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3626">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3626">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3627">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3627">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3628">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3628">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3629">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3629">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3630">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3630">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3631">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3631">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3632">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3632">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3633">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3633">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3634">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3634">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3635">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3635">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3636">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3636">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3637">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3638">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3638">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3639">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3640">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3640">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3641">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3641">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3642">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3642">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3643">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3643">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3644">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3644">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3645">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3645">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3646">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3647">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3647">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3650">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3650">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3651">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3651">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3652">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3652">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3653">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3653">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-3654">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3654">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3655">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3668">FuhrerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3668">FuhrerscheinnummerNr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3669">FuehrerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3669">FuehrerscheinnummerNr</span></span>
