## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3748">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3748">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3749">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3750">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3750">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3751">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3751">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3752">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3753">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3753">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3754">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3754">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3755">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3755">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3756">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3756">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3757">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3757">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3759">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3759">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3761">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3762">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3762">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3763">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3763">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3779">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3779">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3780">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3780">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3781">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3782">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3782">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3783">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3784">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3784">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3785">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3785">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3786">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3786">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3787">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3787">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3788">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3788">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3790">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3793">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3793">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3794">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3794">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3795">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3796">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3796">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3797">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3797">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3798">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3798">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3799">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3817">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3817">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3818">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3819">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3819">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3820">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3821">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3821">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3822">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3822">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3823">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3823">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3824">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3824">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3825">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3825">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3826">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3826">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3827">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3827">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3828">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3828">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3829">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3829">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3830">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3831">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3832">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3833">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3833">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3834">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3834">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3835">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3835">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3836">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3837">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3837">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3863">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3863">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3864">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3865">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3865">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3867">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3867">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3868">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3868">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3869">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3869">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3870">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3870">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3871">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3871">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3872">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3872">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3873">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3873">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3874">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3874">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3875">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3875">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3876">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3877">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3877">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3879">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3880">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3880">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3881">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3881">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3882">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3883">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3883">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3884">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3884">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3885">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3885">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3886">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3886">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3887">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3887">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3888">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3888">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3889">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3889">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3890">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3890">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3891">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3891">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3892">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3892">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3893">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3893">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-3894">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3894">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3895">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3896">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3896">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3898">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3898">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3899">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3900">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3900">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3901">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3902">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3903">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3903">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3904">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3904">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3910">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3910">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3916">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3916">driver's licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3920">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3920">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3921">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3921">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3922">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3923">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3923">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3925">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3925">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3926">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3926">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3927">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3927">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3928">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3928">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3929">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3929">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3930">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3930">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3931">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3931">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3932">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3932">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3933">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3934">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3935">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3936">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3936">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3937">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3937">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3938">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3938">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3939">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3940">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3940">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3941">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3941">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3942">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3942">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3943">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3943">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3944">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3944">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3945">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3945">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3946">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3946">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3947">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3947">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3948">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3948">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3949">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3949">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3950">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3950">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3951">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3951">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3952">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3952">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3953">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3954">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3954">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3956">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3956">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3957">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3958">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3958">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3961">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3961">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3962">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3962">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3963">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3963">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3964">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3964">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3965">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3965">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3966">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3966">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3967">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3967">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3968">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3968">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3969">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3969">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3970">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3971">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3971">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3972">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3973">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3973">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3974">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3975">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3975">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-3977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3978">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3978">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-3979">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3979">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3980">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3980">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-3981">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-3981">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4008">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4008">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4009">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4010">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4010">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4011">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4012">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4012">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4013">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4013">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4014">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4014">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4015">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4015">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4016">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4017">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4017">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4018">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4019">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4019">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4020">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4020">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4021">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4021">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4022">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4023">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4024">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4024">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4025">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4025">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4065">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4065">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4066">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4066">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4067">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4068">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4068">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4069">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4070">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4070">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4071">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4071">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4072">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4072">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4073">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4074">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4074">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4075">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4076">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4077">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4077">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4078">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4078">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4079">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4079">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4080">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4080">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4081">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4081">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4082">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4082">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4083">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4083">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4084">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4084">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4094">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4094">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4095">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4096">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4096">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4098">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4098">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4099">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4099">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4100">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4100">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4101">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4101">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4102">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4102">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4103">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4104">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4104">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4105">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4106">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4106">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4107">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4107">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4108">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4108">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4109">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4109">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4110">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4110">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4113">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4113">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4114">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4114">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4115">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4115">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4116">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4116">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="36517-4117">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4117"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4118">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4118">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4120">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4120">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4121">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4121">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4122">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4122">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4124">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4124">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4126">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4126">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4128">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4128">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4130">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4131">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4131">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4132">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4132">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4133">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4133">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4134">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4134">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4135">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4137">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4137">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4138">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4138">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4139">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4139">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4140">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4142">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4142">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4144">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4144">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4145">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4146">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4146">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4147">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4148">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4148">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4149">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4149">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4150">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4150">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4151">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4151">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4152">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4152">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4172">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4172">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4174">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4174">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4176">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4176">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4177">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4177">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4178">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4178">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4179">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4179">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4180">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4184">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4184">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4185">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4185">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4186">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4187">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4187">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4199">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4199">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4213">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4213">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4215">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4215">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4217">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4217">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4218">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4218">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4219">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4219">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4220">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4220">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4221">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4221">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4222">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4222">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4223">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4223">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4224">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4225">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4225">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4226">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4226">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4228">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4228">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4229">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4229">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4230">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4230">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4231">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4231">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4232">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4232">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4233">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4233">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4234">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4234">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4235">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4235">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4236">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4236">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4237">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4237">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4238">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4238">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4239">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4239">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4240">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4240">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4241">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4241">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4242">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4242">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4243">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4244">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4244">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4245">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4246">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4246">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4247">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4247">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4248">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4248">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4249">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4249">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4250">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4251">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4251">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4254">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4254">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4255">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4255">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4256">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4256">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4257">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4257">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4258">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4258">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4259">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4259">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4260">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4260">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4261">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4261">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4262">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4263">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4263">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4264">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4264">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4265">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4265">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4266">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4266">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4267">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4267">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4268">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4268">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4269">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4269">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4270">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4270">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4272">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4272">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4275">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4275">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4276">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4276">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4277">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4277">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4279">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4279">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4280">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4280">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4283">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4283">Aadhar</span></span>
