## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4287">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4287">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4289">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4289">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4291">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4291">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4292">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4292">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4293">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4293">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4294">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4294">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4295">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4295">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4296">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4296">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4297">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4297">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4298">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4298">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4299">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4299">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4300">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4301">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4302">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4303">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4304">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4304">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4305">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4305">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4306">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4307">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4307">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4308">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4308">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4309">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4309">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4310">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4310">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4311">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4311">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4312">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4313">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4313">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4314">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4315">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4315">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4316">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4316">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4317">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4317">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4318">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4318">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4319">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4319">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4320">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4320">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-4321">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4321">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4322">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4322">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4323">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4324">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4327">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4327">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4328">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4328">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4329">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4329">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4330">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4330">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4331">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4331">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4332">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4333">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4333">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4335">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4335">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4336">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4337">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4337">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4339">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4340">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4340">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4341">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4341">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4343">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4343">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4345">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4345">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-4346">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4346">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4347">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4347">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-4348">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4348">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4349">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4349">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4350">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4351">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4351">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4352">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4353">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4353">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4354">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4354">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4355">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4355">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4356">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4356">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4357">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4358">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4358">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4359">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4359">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4360">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4361">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4362">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4362">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4363">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4363">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-4364">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4364">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4365">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4365">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-4366">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4366">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4367">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4367">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4368">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4368">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4369">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4369">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4370">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4370">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4371">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4371">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4372">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4372">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4373">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4373">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4374">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4375">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4377">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4377">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4378">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4378">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4379">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4379">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4380">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4380">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4381">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4381">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4382">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4382">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4383">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4383">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4384">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4384">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4385">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4385">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4386">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4386">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4387">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4387">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4388">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4388">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4389">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4389">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4390">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4390">ip addresses</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4393">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4393">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4394">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4394">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4395">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4395">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4396">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4396">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4397">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4397">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4398">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4398">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4399">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4399">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4400">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4400">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4401">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4401">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4402">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4402">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4403">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4403">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4404">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4405">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4405">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4406">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4406">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4412">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4412">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4417">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4417">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4418">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4418">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4422">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4422">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4423">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4423">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4424">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4425">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4425">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4427">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4427">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4428">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4428">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4429">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4429">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4430">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4431">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4431">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4432">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4433">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4434">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4434">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4435">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4435">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4436">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4436">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4437">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4437">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4438">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4438">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4440">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4440">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4441">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4441">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4442">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4442">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4443">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4443">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4444">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4444">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4445">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4445">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4447">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4447">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4448">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4448">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4449">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4449">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4450">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4450">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4451">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4452">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4452">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4453">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4453">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4454">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4454">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4455">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4455">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4456">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4456">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4457">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4457">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4458">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4458">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4459">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4460">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4462">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4463">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4463">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4464">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4464">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4465">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4466">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4467">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4467">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4468">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4468">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4513">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4513">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4514">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4515">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4515">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4517">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4517">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4518">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4518">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4519">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4519">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4520">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4520">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4521">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4521">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4522">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4522">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4523">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4523">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4524">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4524">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4525">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4526">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4526">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4527">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4529">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4529">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4530">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4530">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4532">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4532">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4533">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4533">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4534">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4534">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4535">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4535">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4536">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4536">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4537">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4537">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4539">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4539">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4541">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4541">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4542">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4543">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4543">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4545">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4546">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4546">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4547">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4547">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4548">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4548">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4549">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4549">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4550">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4550">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4551">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4551">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4552">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4552">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4553">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4553">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4554">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4554">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4556">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4556">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4557">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4558">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4558">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4559">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4559">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4560">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4560">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4561">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4561">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4562">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4562">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4563">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4564">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4564">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4565">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4566">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4566">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4567">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4567">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4568">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4568">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4569">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4569">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4570">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4570">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4571">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4571">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4572">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4572">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4573">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4573">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4574">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4575">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4575">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4576">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4577">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4577">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4578">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4578">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4579">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4579">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4580">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4580">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4581">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4581">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4582">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4582">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4583">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4583">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4584">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4584">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4586">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4589">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4589">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4590">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4590">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4591">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4591">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4592">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4592">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4627">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4627">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4628">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4628">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4629">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4630">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4630">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4631">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4632">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4632">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4633">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4633">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4634">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4634">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4635">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4636">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4636">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4637">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4638">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4639">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4639">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4640">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4640">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4641">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4641">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4642">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4642">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4643">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4643">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4644">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4644">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4645">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4645">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4646">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4646">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4647">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4647">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4652">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4652">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4654">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4654">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4656">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4656">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4657">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4657">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4658">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4658">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4659">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4659">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4660">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4660">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4661">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4662">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4662">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4663">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4664">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4664">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4665">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4665">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4666">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4666">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4667">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4668">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4668">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4676">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4676">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4677">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4678">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4678">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4679">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4680">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4680">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4681">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4681">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4682">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4682">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4683">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4683">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4684">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4684">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4685">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4685">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4686">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4687">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4688">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4689">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4689">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4690">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4690">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4691">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4692">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4692">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4693">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4693">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4694">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4696">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4696">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4697">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4697">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4756">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4756">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4757">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4758">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4758">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4760">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4760">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4761">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4762">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4765">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4765">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4766">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4794">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4794">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4795">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4796">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4796">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4798">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4798">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4799">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4799">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4800">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4800">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4801">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4802">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4804">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4804">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4805">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4805">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4806">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4806">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4808">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4808">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4821">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4821">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4822">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4823">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4823">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4824">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4825">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4825">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4826">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4826">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4827">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4827">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4828">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4829">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4829">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4830">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4830">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4831">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4832">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4832">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4833">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4835">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4835">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4836">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4836">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4837">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4837">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4838">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4838">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4851">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4851">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4852">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4853">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4853">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4855">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4855">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4856">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4857">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4859">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4859">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4860">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4860">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4861">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4861">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
