## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4868">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4869">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4870">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4872">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4873">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4873">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4874">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4874">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4875">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4875">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4876">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4877">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4880">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4881">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4882">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4884">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4885">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4886">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4887">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4888">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4888">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4889">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4890">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4890">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4891">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4892">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4892">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4893">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4894">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4894">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4895">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4896">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4896">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4897">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4897">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4898">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4898">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4912">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4912">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4913">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4914">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4914">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4916">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4916">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4917">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4917">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4918">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4918">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4919">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4919">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4920">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4920">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4921">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4922">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4923">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4924">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4924">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4925">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4925">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4926">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4926">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4927">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4927">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4928">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4928">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4929">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4929">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4930">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4930">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4931">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4931">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4932">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4932">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4933">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4933">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4934">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4934">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4935">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4935">社会保険のテンキー</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4937">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4937">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4938">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4938">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4939">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4940">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4940">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4941">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4942">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4942">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4943">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4943">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4944">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4944">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4945">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4946">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4947">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4948">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4949">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4949">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4950">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4950">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4966">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4966">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4967">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4968">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4968">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4970">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4970">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4971">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4971">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4972">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4972">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4973">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4973">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4974">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4974">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4975">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4975">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4976">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4976">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4977">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4977">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4978">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4978">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4979">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4979">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4980">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4981">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-4982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-4983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4984">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4984">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4985">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4985">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-4986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-4987">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-4987">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5050">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5050">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5051">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5051">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5052">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5053">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5053">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5055">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5055">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5056">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5056">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5057">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5057">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5059">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5059">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5062">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5062">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5063">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5063">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5064">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5064">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5065">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5065">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5066">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5066">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5067">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5067">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5068">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5068">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5070">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5070">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5071">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5071">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5072">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5072">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5073">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5073">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5074">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5074">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5075">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5075">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5076">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5076">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5077">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5077">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5078">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5078">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5079">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5079">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5080">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5080">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5081">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5081">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5097">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5097">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5098">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5099">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5099">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5100">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5101">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5101">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5102">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5102">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5103">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5103">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5104">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5104">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5105">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5105">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5106">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5107">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5107">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5108">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5109">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5109">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5110">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5110">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5111">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5111">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5112">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5112">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5113">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5113">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5148">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5148">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5149">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5149">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5151">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5151">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5153">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5153">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5154">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5155">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5155">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5156">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5157">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5158">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5158">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5159">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5159">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5166">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5166">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5167">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5168">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5169">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5171">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5176">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5177">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5193">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5193">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5194">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5195">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5195">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5197">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5197">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5198">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5198">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5199">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5199">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5200">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5201">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5204">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5204">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5205">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5205">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5207">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5207">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5230">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5230">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5231">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5231">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5232">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5233">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5233">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5234">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5235">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5235">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5236">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5237">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5237">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5239">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5240">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5240">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5241">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5241">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5242">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5242">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5243">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5243">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5248">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5248">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5249">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5250">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5250">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5251">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5252">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5252">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5253">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5253">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5254">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5254">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5255">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5255">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5256">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5256">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5257">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5257">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5258">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5258">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5259">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5259">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5260">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5260">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5262">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5265">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5265">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5266">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5266">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5267">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5268">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5268">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5308">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5308">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5309">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5310">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5310">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5312">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5312">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5313">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5313">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5314">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5314">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5315">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5315">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5316">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5316">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5317">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5317">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5318">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5318">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5319">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5319">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5320">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5320">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5321">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5321">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5322">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5322">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5323">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5323">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5324">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5324">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5351">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5351">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5352">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5352">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5354">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5354">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5356">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5356">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5357">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5357">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5358">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5358">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5359">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5359">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5360">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5360">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5361">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5361">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5363">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5366">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5366">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5367">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5367">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5373">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5373">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5374">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5374">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5379">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5379">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5380">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5380">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5383">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5383">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5385">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5385">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5387">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5387">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5388">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5388">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5389">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5389">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5390">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5391">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5391">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5394">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5394">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5395">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5395">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5396">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5396">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5397">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5397">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5398">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5399">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5399">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5403">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5403">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5404">numru ta ' personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5404">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5405">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5405">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5406">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5406">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5407">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5407">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5408">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5408">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5409">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5409">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5410">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5410">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5411">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5411">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5412">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5412">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5413">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5413">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5414">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5414">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5415">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5415">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5416">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5417">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5417">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5418">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5419">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5419">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5420">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5421">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5421">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5422">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5424">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5424">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5425">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5426">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5426">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5427">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5427">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5428">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5428">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5429">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5429">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5430">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5430">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5431">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5431">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5432">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5432">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5433">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5434">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5434">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5435">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5435">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5436">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5436">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5437">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5437">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5438">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5439">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5439">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5440">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5440">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5441">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5441">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5442">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5442">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5443">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5443">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5444">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5444">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5445">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5445">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5446">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5446">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5447">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5447">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5448">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5448">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5449">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5449">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5450">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5451">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5451">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5484">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5484">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5486">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5486">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5488">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5488">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5489">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5489">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5490">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5490">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5491">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5492">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5492">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5493">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5493">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5495">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5495">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5498">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5498">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5499">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5499">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5500">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5524">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5524">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5525">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5525">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5526">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5527">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5527">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5528">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5529">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5529">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5530">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5530">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5531">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5531">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5532">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5532">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5533">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5533">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5534">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5534">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5535">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5535">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5553">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5553">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5554">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5554">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5556">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5556">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5558">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5558">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5560">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5560">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5563">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5563">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5564">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5564">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5568">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5568">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5574">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5574">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5575">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5576">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5576">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5577">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5578">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5578">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5579">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5580">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5580">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5581">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5582">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5582">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5583">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5583">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5584">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5585">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5585">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5586">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5586">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
