## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5624">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5624">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5626">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5626">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5628">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5628">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5629">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5629">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5630">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5630">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5631">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5631">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5632">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5632">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5633">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5633">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5634">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5634">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5635">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5635">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5637">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5637">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5639">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5640">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5640">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5641">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5641">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5642">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5642">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5643">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5643">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5652">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5652">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5654">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5654">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5656">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5656">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5657">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5657">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5658">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5658">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5659">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5659">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5660">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5660">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5661">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5661">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5662">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5662">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5663">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5663">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5664">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5664">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5665">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5666">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5666">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5667">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5668">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5668">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5669">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5669">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5670">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5670">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5672">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5672">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5680">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5680">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5681">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5682">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5682">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5684">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5684">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5685">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5685">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5686">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5686">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5687">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5688">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5688">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5689">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5691">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5691">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5692">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5692">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5693">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5694">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5694">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5761">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5761">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5762">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5763">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5763">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5765">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5765">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5766">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5766">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5767">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5767">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5768">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5768">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5769">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5769">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5770">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5770">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5771">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5772">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5772">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5773">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5774">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5775">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5775">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5776">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5776">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5777">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5777">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5778">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5778">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5779">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5779">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5780">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5780">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5781">ird 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5781">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5782">ird 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5782">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5783">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5783">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5784">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5784">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5785">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5785">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5786">inland 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5786">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5787">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5787">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5789">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5789">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5791">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5791">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5792">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5793">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5793">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5796">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5796">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5797">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5797">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5798">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5798">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5799">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5799">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5800">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5800">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5801">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5801">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5802">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5802">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5803">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5803">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5804">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5804">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5805">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5805">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5807">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5807">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5809">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5809">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5810">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5810">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5811">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5811">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5812">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5812">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5813">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5813">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5814">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5814">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5816">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5819">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5819">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5820">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5820">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5821">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5821">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5822">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5822">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5823">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5823">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5824">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5824">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5825">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5825">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5826">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5826">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5827">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5827">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5828">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5828">social welfare number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5830">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5830">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5831">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5832">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5834">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5834">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5835">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5835">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5836">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5836">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5837">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5837">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5838">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5839">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5839">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5840">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5841">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5842">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5842">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5843">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5843">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5844">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5844">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5846">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5846">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5847">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5847">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5856">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5856">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5857">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5857">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5858">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5858">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5859">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5859">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5860">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5860">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5861">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5861">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5862">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5862">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5863">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5863">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5864">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5864">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5865">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5865">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5867">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5870">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5870">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5871">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5871">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5872">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5872">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5873">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5873">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5874">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5874">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5875">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5875">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5876">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5876">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5877">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5877">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5878">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5878">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5879">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5879">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5880">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5881">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5881">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5883">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5883">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5884">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5884">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5885">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5885">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5886">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5886">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5887">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5887">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5888">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5888">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5889">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5890">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5891">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5893">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5893">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5894">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5894">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5900">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5900">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5903">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5903">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5904">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5904">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5906">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5906">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5907">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5907">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5910">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5910">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5911">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5912">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5912">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5914">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5914">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5915">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5916">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5918">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5919">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5919">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5920">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5920">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5921">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5922">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5922">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5923">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5923">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5926">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5926">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5927">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5927">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5929">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5929">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5930">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5930">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-5931">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5931">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5932">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5932">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5933">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5934">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5934">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5935">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5935">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5936">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5936">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5937">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5937">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5938">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5938">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5939">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5940">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5940">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5942">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5943">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5943">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5944">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5944">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5945">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5946">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5947">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5947">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5948">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5949">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5949">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5950">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5950">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5955">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5955">nr.-pesel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5957">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5957">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5958">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5958">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5959">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5959">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5960">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5960">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-5961">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5961">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5962">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5963">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5963">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5964">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5965">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5965">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5966">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5967">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5968">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5969">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5969">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5970">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5970">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5971">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5971">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5972">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5972">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5973">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5973">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5974">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5974">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5975">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5975">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5976">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5976">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-5977">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5977">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5978">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5978">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5979">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5979">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5980">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5981">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5981">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5982">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5983">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5983">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5984">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5984">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5985">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5985">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5986">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5986">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5987">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5987">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5988">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5989">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5989">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-5990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5991">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5991">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5992">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5992">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5993">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5993">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-5994">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5994">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-5995">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-5995">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6012">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6012">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6014">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6014">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6016">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6016">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6017">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6017">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6018">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6018">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6019">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6019">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6020">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6020">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6021">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6021">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6022">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6022">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6052">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6052">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6053">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6054">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6054">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6056">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6056">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6057">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6058">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6058">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6059">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6060">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6060">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6061">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6061">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6062">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6062">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6063">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6063">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6082">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6082">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6083">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6083">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6084">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6084">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6085">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6085">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6086">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6086">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6087">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6087">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6088">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6088">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6089">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6089">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6090">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6091">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6091">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6092">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6092">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6093">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6094">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6094">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6095">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6096">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6096">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6097">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6097">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6098">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6098">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6114">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6114">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6115">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6115">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6116">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6116">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6117">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6117">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6118">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6119">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6119">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6120">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6120">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6121">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6121">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6122">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6123">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6123">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6125">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6126">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6126">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6127">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6127">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6128">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6128">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6129">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6129">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6130">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6130">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6131">포르투갈어 passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6131">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6132">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6132">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6133">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6133">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6134">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6134">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6135">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6136">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6136">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6137">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6137">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6138">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6138">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6139">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6139">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6140">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6140">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6141">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6141">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6142">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6142">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6143">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6144">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6144">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6145">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6146">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6147">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6147">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6148">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6148">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6149">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6150">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6150">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6161">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6161">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6162">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6162">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6164">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6164">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6175">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6175">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6176">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6176">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6178">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6178">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6180">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6180">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6181">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6181">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6182">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6182">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6183">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6184">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6184">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6185">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6186">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6187">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6187">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6188">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6188">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6193">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6193">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6194">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6194">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6200">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6200">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6204">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6204">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6205">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6206">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6206">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6207">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6208">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6208">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6209">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6209">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6210">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6210">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6211">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6211">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6212">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6213">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6213">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6215">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6216">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6216">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6217">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6217">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6219">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6219">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6270">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6270">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6271">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6271">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6272">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6272">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6273">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6273">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6274">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6274">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6275">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6275">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6276">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6277">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6277">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6280">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6280">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6281">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6281">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6283">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6283">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6284">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6284">passport number</span></span>
