## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6288">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6288">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6290">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6290">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6292">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6292">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6293">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6293">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6294">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6294">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6295">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6295">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6296">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6296">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6297">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6297">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6298">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6298">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6299">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6299">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6300">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6300">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6302">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6302">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6303">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6303">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6320">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6320">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6321">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6322">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6322">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6323">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6324">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6324">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6325">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6325">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6326">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6326">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6327">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6327">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6328">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6329">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6329">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6331">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6332">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6332">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6333">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6333">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6350">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6350">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6351">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6352">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6352">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6354">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6354">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6355">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6356">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6356">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6357">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6358">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6358">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6359">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6359">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6360">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6360">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6361">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6361">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6362">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6362">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6363">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6363">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6364">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6364">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6365">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6365">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6366">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6366">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6367">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6367">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6368">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6368">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6369">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6369">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6370">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6370">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6371">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6371">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6372">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6372">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6373">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6373">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6374">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6374">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6375">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6376">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6378">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6379">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6379">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6380">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6380">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6381">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6381">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6382">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6383">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6383">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6384">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6384">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6395">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6395">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6396">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6396">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6397">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6397">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6398">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6398">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6399">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6399">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6400">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6400">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6401">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6401">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6402">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6402">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6403">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6404">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6405">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6407">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6407">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6408">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6424">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6424">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6426">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6426">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6428">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6428">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6429">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6429">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6430">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6430">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6431">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6431">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6433">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6436">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6436">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6437">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6438">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6439">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6439">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6486">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6486">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6487">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6487">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6488">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6489">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6489">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6490">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6491">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6491">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6492">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6493">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6493">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6495">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6496">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6496">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6497">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6497">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6498">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6498">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6499">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6499">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6500">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6500">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6501">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6501">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6502">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6502">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6503">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6503">číslo pasu</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6504">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6504">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6505">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6505">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6506">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6507">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6507">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6509">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6509">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6510">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6511">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6513">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6513">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6514">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6514">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6515">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6515">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6531">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6531">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6532">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6533">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6533">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6534">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6535">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6535">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6536">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6536">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6537">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6537">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6538">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6538">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6539">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6539">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6540">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6541">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6541">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6544">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6544">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6545">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6545">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6546">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6546">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6547">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6547">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6575">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6575">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6576">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6576">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6577">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6578">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6578">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6580">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6580">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6581">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6581">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6582">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6582">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6583">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6583">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6585">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6588">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6588">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6589">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6589">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6590">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6590">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6591">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6591">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6592">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6592">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6593">슬로베니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6593">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6594">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6594">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6595">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6595">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6596">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6596">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6597">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6598">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6598">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6600">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6600">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6601">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6601">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6602">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6602">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6603">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6604">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6604">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6605">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6606">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6606">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6607">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6607">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6608">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6608">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6609">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6609">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6610">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6610">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6620">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6620">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6621">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6621">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6622">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6622">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6623">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6623">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6624">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6624">tax registration number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6634">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6634">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6635">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6636">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6636">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6637">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6638">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6639">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6639">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6640">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6640">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6641">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6641">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6642">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6642">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6643">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6643">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6644">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6645">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6645">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6648">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6648">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6649">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6649">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6650">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6651">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6651">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6652">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6652">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6653">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6653">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6654">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6654">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6655">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6655">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6656">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6656">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6657">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6658">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6658">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6660">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6660">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6661">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6661">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6662">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6662">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6663">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6663">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6664">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6664">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6665">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6665">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6666">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6666">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6668">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6671">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6671">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6672">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6672">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6673">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6673">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6675">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6675">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6678">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6678">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6679">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6679">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6680">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6680">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6681">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6681">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6682">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6682">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6683">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6683">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6684">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6684">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6685">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6685">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6686">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6687">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6687">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6689">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6689">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6690">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6690">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6691">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6691">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6693">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6693">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6696">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6696">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6697">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6697">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6734">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6734">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6735">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6736">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6736">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6738">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6738">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6739">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6739">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6740">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6740">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6741">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6741">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6742">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6743">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6744">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6745">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6745">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6746">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6746">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6747">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6747">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6748">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6748">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6749">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6749">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6772">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6772">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6773">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6773">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6774">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6774">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6776">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6776">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6778">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6778">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6779">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6779">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6780">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6780">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6781">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6781">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6782">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6783">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6783">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6784">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6785">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6785">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6786">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6786">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6787">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6787">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6788">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6788">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6789">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6789">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6790">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6790">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6791">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6791">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6792">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6792">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6793">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6793">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6794">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6794">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6795">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6795">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6796">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6796">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6797">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6797">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6798">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6798">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6799">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6799">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6800">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6800">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6802">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6802">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6804">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6804">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6805">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6805">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6806">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6806">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6807">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6807">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6808">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6808">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6809">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6809">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6814">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6814">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6815">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6815">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6816">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6816">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6817">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6817">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6818">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6818">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6820">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6820">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6822">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6822">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6823">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6823">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6824">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6824">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6825">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6825">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6826">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6826">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6827">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6827">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6828">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6828">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6829">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6829">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6830">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6830">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6831">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6831">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6832">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6832">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6833">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6833">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6834">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6834">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6835">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6835">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6836">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6836">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6837">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6837">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6838">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6838">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6839">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6839">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6840">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6840">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6841">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6842">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6842">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6843">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6844">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6845">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6845">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6846">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6846">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6847">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6847">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6848">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6848">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6849">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6849">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6850">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6850">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6854">número de contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6854">número de contribuyente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6855">número de identificación 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6855">número de identificación fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6856">número de impuesto corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6856">número de impuesto corporativo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6857">spanishcifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6857">spanishcifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6858">spanishcifid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6858">spanishcifid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6859">spanishcifno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6859">spanishcifno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6860">spanishcifno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6860">spanishcifno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6861">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6861">tax file no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6862">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6862">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6863">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6863">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6864">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6864">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6865">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6865">tax identification number</span></span>
