## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6879">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6879">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6880">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6881">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6881">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6882">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6883">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6883">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6884">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6884">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6885">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6885">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6886">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6886">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6887">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6887">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6888">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6888">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6889">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6889">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6890">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6891">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6891">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6893">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6893">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6894">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6894">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6895">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6895">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6896">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6896">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6897">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6897">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6898">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6898">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6899">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6899">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6900">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6900">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6901">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6901">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6902">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6902">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6903">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6903">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6904">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6904">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6905">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6905">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6906">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6906">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6907">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6907">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-6908">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6908">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-6909">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6909">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-6910">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6910">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-6911">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6911">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6912">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6912">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6913">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6913">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6914">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6914">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6915">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6915">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6916">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6916">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6917">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6917">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6918">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6918">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6919">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6919">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6920">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6920">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6921">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6921">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-6922">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6922">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6923">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6923">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="36517-6924">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6924">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6925">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6925">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6926">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6927">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6928">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6928">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6929">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6930">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6930">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6931">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6931">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6932">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6932">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6933">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6933">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6934">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6934">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6935">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6935">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6936">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6936">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6937">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6937">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6938">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6938">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6939">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6939">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6940">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6940">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6941">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6941">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6942">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6942">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6943">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6943">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6944">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6944">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6945">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6945">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6946">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6946">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6947">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6947">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6948">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6948">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6949">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6949">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6950">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6950">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6951">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6951">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6952">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6952">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6953">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6953">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6954">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6954">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6955">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6955">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6956">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6956">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6957">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6957">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6958">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6958">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6959">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6959">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6960">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6960">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6961">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6961">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6962">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6962">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6963">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6963">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6965">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6965">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6968">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6968">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6969">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6969">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6970">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6970">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6971">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6972">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6972">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-6973">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6973">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6992">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6992">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-6993">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6993">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6994">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6995">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6995">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6996">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6997">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6997">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-6998">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6998">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-6999">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-6999">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7000">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7000">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7001">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7001">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7002">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7002">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7003">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7003">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7004">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7004">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7005">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7005">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7036">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7036">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7037">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7037">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7038">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7038">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7039">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7039">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7040">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7040">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7041">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7041">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7042">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7042">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7043">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7043">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7044">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7044">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7045">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7045">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7046">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7046">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7047">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7048">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7048">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7050">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7050">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7051">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7051">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7052">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7052">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7054">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7054">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7055">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7055">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7056">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7056">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7057">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7057">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7058">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7058">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7059">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7059">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7060">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7060">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7061">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7061">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7062">개인 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7062">personal identification no</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7070">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7070">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7071">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7072">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7072">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7073">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7074">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7074">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7075">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7075">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7076">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7076">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7077">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7077">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7078">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7078">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7079">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7079">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7080">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7080">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7081">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7082">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7084">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7085">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7085">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7086">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7086">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7087">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7087">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7088">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7088">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7114">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7114">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7115">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7116">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7116">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7118">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7118">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7119">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7119">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7120">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7120">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7121">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7121">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7122">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7122">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7123">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7123">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7128">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7128">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7129">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7129">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7163">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7163">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7164">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7165">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7165">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7166">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7167">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7167">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7168">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7168">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7169">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7169">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7170">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7170">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7171">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7171">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7172">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7172">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7173">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7173">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7174">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7174">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7175">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7175">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7176">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7176">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7177">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7178">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7178">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7179">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7179">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7180">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7180">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7181">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7182">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7182">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7203">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7203">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7204">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7204">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7205">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7205">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7206">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7207">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7207">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7208">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7208">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7209">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7209">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7210">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7210">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7211">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7215">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7215">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7216">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7216">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7219">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7219">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7226">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7226">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7229">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7229">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7230">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7230">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7231">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7231">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7232">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7232">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7233">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7233">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7234">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7234">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7235">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7235">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7236">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7236">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7237">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7237">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7238">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7238">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7239">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7239">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7240">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7240">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7241">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7242">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7242">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7243">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7243">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7244">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7244">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7245">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7245">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7246">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7247">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7251">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7251">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7252">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7252">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7253">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7253">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7254">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7254">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7255">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7255">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7256">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7256">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7257">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7257">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7258">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7258">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7259">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7259">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7260">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7260">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7261">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7261">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7262">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7262">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7263">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7263">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7264">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7265">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7265">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7267">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7267">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7268">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7268">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7269">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7269">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7270">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7271">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7272">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7273">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7274">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7274">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7275">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7275">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7289">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7289">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7290">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7291">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7291">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7292">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7292">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7293">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7293">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7294">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7294">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7295">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7295">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7297">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7300">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7300">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7301">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7301">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7303">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7303">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7306">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7306">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7307">Id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7307">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7308">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7308">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7309">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7309">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7310">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7310">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7311">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7311">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7312">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7312">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7313">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7314">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7314">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7316">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7316">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7317">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7318">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7321">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7321">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7322">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7322">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7324">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7324">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7325">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7325">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7326">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7326">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7327">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7327">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7328">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7328">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7331">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7331">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7332">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7332">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7333">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7333">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7334">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7335">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7335">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7337">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7337">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7338">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7338">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7339">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7339">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7340">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7340">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7341">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7341">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7342">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7342">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7343">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7344">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7345">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7346">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7346">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7347">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7347">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7348">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7348">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7349">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7349">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7367">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7367">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7368">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7368">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7369">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7370">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7370">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7372">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7372">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7373">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7374">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7374">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7375">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7376">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7377">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7377">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7378">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7378">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7379">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7380">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7380">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7381">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7381">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7382">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7382">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7383">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7383">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7384">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7384">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7385">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7385">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7386">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7386">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7387">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7388">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7388">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7390">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7390">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7391">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7391">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7392">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7392">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7393">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7393">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7394">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7394">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7395">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7395">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7400">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7400">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7401">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7401">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7402">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7402">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7403">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7403">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7404">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7404">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7405">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7405">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7406">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7406">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7407">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7407">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7408">국립 보건 서비스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7408">national health service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7411">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7411">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7412">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7412">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7413">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7413">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7414">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7414">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7415">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7415">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7416">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7416">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7417">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7417">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7418">G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7418">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7419">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7419">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7420">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7420">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7421">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7421">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7422">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7422">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7423">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7423">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7424">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7424">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7425">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7425">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7426">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7427">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7427">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7429">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7429">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7430">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7430">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7431">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7431">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7432">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7432">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7433">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7433">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7434">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7434">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7435">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7435">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7436">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7436">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7437">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7437">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7438">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7438">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7439">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7439">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7440">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7440">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7441">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7441">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7442">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7442">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7444">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7444">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7447">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7447">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7448">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7448">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7449">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7449">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7450">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7450">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7451">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7451">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7453">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7453">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7464">great britain</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7465">NI 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7465">NI Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7470">insurancenumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7470">insurancenumber</span></span>
