## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7473">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7473">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7474">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7474">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7475">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7476">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7476">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7478">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7478">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7483">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7483">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7484">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7484">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7489">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7504">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7504">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7506">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7506">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7508">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7508">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7510">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7513">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7513">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7514">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7514">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7544">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7544">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7545">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7546">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7546">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7547">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7548">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7548">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7549">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7549">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7550">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7550">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7551">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7552">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7552">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7555">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7555">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7556">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7556">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7557">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7557">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7558">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7558">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7559">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7559">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7560">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7560">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7561">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7561">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7562">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7562">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7563">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7563">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7660">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7660">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7662">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7662">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7664">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7664">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7665">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7665">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7666">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7666">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7667">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7667">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7668">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7668">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7669">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7669">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7670">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7670">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7671">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7671">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7672">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7672">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7673">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7673">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7674">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7674">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7675">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7675">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7676">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7676">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7677">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7678">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7678">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7679">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7681">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7681">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7682">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7682">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7683">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7683">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7684">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7684">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7685">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7685">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7686">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7686">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7687">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7687">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7688">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7688">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7689">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7689">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7690">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7690">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7691">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7691">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="36517-7692">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7692">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7693">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7693">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7694">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7694">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7695">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7695">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7696">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7696">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7697">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7697">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7698">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7698">itin</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7713">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7713">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7714">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7715">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7715">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7716">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7716">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7717">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7718">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7718">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7719">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7719">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7720">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7720">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7721">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7721">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7722">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7722">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7724">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7727">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7727">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7728">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7728">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7729">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7730">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7730">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7731">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7731">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7732">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7733">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7733">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7734">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7735">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7735">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7736">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7736">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7737">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7737">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7752">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7752">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7753">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7753">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36517-7754">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7754">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36517-7755">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7755">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7756">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7757">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7757">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7759">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7759">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7760">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7761">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7761">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7764">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7764">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7765">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7765">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7786">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7786">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7787">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7788">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7788">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7789">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7790">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7790">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7791">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7792">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7792">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7793">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7795">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7795">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7796">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7796">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7805">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7805">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7807">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7807">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7809">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7809">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7810">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7810">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7811">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7811">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7812">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7813">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7813">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="36517-7814">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36517-7815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7815">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7816">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7816">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="36517-7817">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36517-7817">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
